original: Dahl, Axel Einar, major, Vänersborg, f. 2/12/80 i Lidköp. G. 23 m. Rut Jonsson. Barn: Lennart f. 24, Margareta 27. — Mog:ex. i Gbg 00, off:ex. 02, GCI 10-12, ksp-kurs 19. Und:löjtn. v. Västg. reg. 02, löjtn. 06, kapt. 17, major i armén 30. Landst:-omr:befälh. 30, robefälh. 38. RSO.
translated: Dahl, Axel Einar, Major, Vänersborg, born on December 2, 1880 in Lidköping. Married on the 23rd of an unspecified month to Rut Jonsson. Children: Lennart, born in 1924, and Margareta, born in 1927. He completed his compulsory military service in Gothenburg in 1900, graduated from the officers' training school in 1902, attended the General Course of the Infantry from 1910 to 1912, and completed the staff course in 1919. He was promoted to second lieutenant in the Västgöta Regiment in 1902, to lieutenant in 1906, to captain in 1917, and to major in the army in 1930. He was the commander of a district in 1930 and of a military region in 1938. He was awarded the Order of the Sword.
